name: False Awakening | Episode 2
description:
Synopsis:

'False Awakening' is a dark, story-focused, psychological game about a young man who is stuck inside his own dream.

While Episode 1 was relatively light, this Episode 2 deals with a more darker aspect of the story.

Here's the teaser/trailer for the Episode 1 & 2.


Features:
  • Trippy graphics!
  • AWESOME music!
  • A complex, yet simple story 
  • Containing funny & silly moments
  • 1 hr+ of playtime
Details:
  • Title: False Awakening | Episode 2
  • Subtitle: Episode 2: "No shock greater than death."
  • Playtime: 1 hour+
  • Genre: Story-focused, Dark, Psychological.
  • Game Engine: RPG Maker MV
  • Play Mechanic:  You just walk from one place to the next, interact, and have dialogue. (No battle system, no choices. This game is a 'linear' experience.)
System Requirement:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • RAM: 4 GB
  • Graphics: A decent Nvidia Graphics Card (The game uses a lot of Effects)
  • Directx: Version 9
  • Storage: Around 400 MB available space
  • Controls Support: You need either a Keyboard, or Mouse, or Gamepad. (Everything works. Gamepad may need some tweaking.)
  • Extra Note: If this game doesn't run on your PC... then trust me, it hurts me, more than it hurts you. (╥﹏╥)
Credits:

The complete credits (with links) are mentioned in a document right beside the .exe file, and inside the game. (I'm skipping from mentioning them here... because the list is a bit long.)
